content.html: elon did not 'buy Twitter' he impulsively made a ludicrously overpriced offer on Twitter signed a contract that put him on the hook for that exact amount tried to back out but was sued BY TWITTER to complete the buyout at the ridiculous price and is now in a deal where-
content.value:
elon did not 'buy Twitter' 

he impulsively made a ludicrously overpriced offer on Twitter 

signed a contract that put him on the hook for that exact amount 

tried to back out but was sued BY TWITTER to complete the buyout at the ridiculous price 

and is now in a deal where-
